The range of annual returns from trading options depends on the level of risk taken. A common approach is to aim for a multiple of the risk-free rate, typically 3 to 4 times.

Aim for a trading range of 3 to 4 times on the low side and 5 to 7 times on the high side. Reasonable expectations for trading are 18 to 36% targets. Results may vary, but aim for at least 3 to 4 times the risk-free rates.
